text: Te, kto ne uveroval v voskresheniye, skazali: "Neuzheli posle smerti, kogda my stanem prakhom, smeshannym s zemloy, ot kotoroy yego nel'zya otlichit', my snova budem voskresheny?" Eti nevernyye otritsayut ne tol'ko voskreseniye, no oprovergayut to, chto oni predstanut pered Allakhom i vso, chto budet v dal'ney zhizni
